\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
	\begin{axis}[
			% title={2D Histogram from File},
    xlabel={X [pads]},
    ylabel={Y [pads]},
			domain=0:127,
			xmin=0, xmax=127,
			ymin=0, ymax=127,
			colormap name = managua,
			colorbar,
      colorbar style={title={Charge [fC]}, 
      title style={rotate=90, align=center, at={(2.15, 0.5)}}},
		]
		\addplot [
			matrix plot*,
			mesh/rows=128,
			mesh/cols=128,
			point meta=explicit,
		]
		table [x index=0, y index=1, meta index=2, col sep=space] {./Events/run_157_entry_46581.dat};
	\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
